title: Agri Drone Sprayer: The Future of Modern Farming

subtasks: Load the drone with pesticides or fertilizers.
Fly the Agri-Drone over the crop field.
Navigate the drone over diverse terrain.
Adjust the drone's settings for different crops.
Advocate for the adoption of Agri-Drones.
Educate farmers about the benefits of Agri-Drone Sprayers.
Highlight environmental advantages of precision spraying.
Compare Agri-Drones to traditional spraying methods.
Discuss the future of modern farming with Agritech solutions.
Inspect the drone for wear and tear.
Ensure the drone's software is up to date.
Conduct test flights to check performance.
